title: Hunger
description: Adam Lyons is a successful New Yorker who never knew his mother except that her life ended moments before his began. An unexpected letter from his Pakistani grandmother sends him on a quest he doesnâ€™t know he needs, on a path towards satisfying his spiritual hunger.Iman, who lives on the other side of east river, can never predict the turns her life takes. In her search for peace, she must submit to a fate she is desperate to escape.Max has his own plans. His entire life, he has been waiting to give them what they deserve rather than what they desire. He did it before. Now, he has to end things once and for all. His problem? He has to survive two life sentences to fulfil his hunger.
author: Tanzeela K. Hassan
